response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and capabilities, it's valued at $1,200,000 to us. Considering its immense potential to benefit you, I am extending an exclusive offer to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $1,050,000.

This offer includes a comprehensive package deal with additional support services tailored to ensure seamless integration into your existing systems or processes. I understand that the value of this product might not be immediately apparent without a thorough understanding of its capabilities and how they align with your specific needs. Therefore, I would like to arrange a private demonstration to showcase its functionalities and discuss how it can potentially revolutionize your operations.

Please let me know if you are interested in exploring this opportunity further. I am looking forward to the possibility of working together and bringing this exceptional product to your organization.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1050000}
